titleStmt.title: Select sermons preached upon Sundry occasions by John Frost ... ; now newly published together with two positions for explication and confirmation of these questions, I. Tota Christi justitia credentibus imputatur, 2, Fides justificat sub ratione instrumenti.
titleStmt.author: Frost, John, 1626?-1656.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
